Posts.Content: I was diagnosed with stage 2 breast cancer in May of 2016. I have finished all my treatments and just went back on December 28th, to have some scans to see how things are looking. Received a call on Wednesday and they said the ct scan sowed a spot on my lung. Wanted to see if anyone has had this happen to them. Im really nervous and scared
Posts.Title: Bad report after finishing my treatments.
